title: WANTED: Love of my Life
description: Angela's life pretty much sucked until she met Giacomo. Tall, dark and handsome, he would be everything she could wish for - if he weren't a penniless and homeless illegal Italian immigrant who happens to be four years her senior.Or is he? Penniless and homeless, that is. The truth that slowly unravels seems to be far more sinister and bloody. Suffice it to say that Angela doesn't exactly look forward to meeting his family, especially his godfather...Follow Angela on her journey as she struggles to find her place in a world beyond her wildest dreams - and nightmares.
author: Robert Thier
